body_html: Regarding 2. you don’t need pytest. They exit early when one of the scripts fails because we’ve set a bash flag that terminates the script when anything fails. Removing it should fix the problem

body: Regarding 2. you don’t need pytest. They exit early when one of the scripts fails because we’ve set a bash flag that terminates the script when anything fails. Removing it should fix the problem
